text: Knife in the Water () is a 1962 Polish drama movie directed by Roman Polanski in his directorial debut and stars Leon Niemczyk, Jolanta Umecka, Zygmunt Malanowi. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1964. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1962 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Roman Polanski
title: Knife in the Water
